1.0.0.name: wordpress/absolum
1.0.0.description: Build your attractive theme from color options, custom header (8 preinstalled) and background (7 preinstalled) - that's Absolum. Use your imagination and get a theme layout which you like. You may decide if you want right, left or disabled sidebar. Add up to 7 subscribe/follow buttons. Display last post(s) as static, as a slideshow or cool Nivo Slider. Choose content font or add your own CSS style. The Absolum also comes with Custom menu (8 preinstalled color schemes), 6 widgetized areas and the admin Visual Editor. Absolum is cross-browser compatible.
